mapper.sql: ID, NAME, TYPE_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, BUILDING_ID, FLOOR, SEQUENCE, SHARE_ENABLE, NODE_PATH, IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE, PERMISSION_ATTR_ID, DEVICE_TYPE, NODE_ID, R_INT1, R_INT2, NUM1, NUM2, VC1, VC2, CHR1, CHR2

R.ID, R.NAME, R.TYPE_ID, R.STATUS, R.CREATE_DATE, R.CREATE_USER, R.BUILDING_ID, R.FLOOR, R.SEQUENCE, R.SHARE_ENABLE, R.NODE_PATH, R.IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE, R.PERMISSION_ATTR_ID, R.DEVICE_TYPE, R.NODE_ID, R.R_INT1, R.R_INT2, R.NUM1, R.NUM2, R.VC1, R.VC2, R.CHR1, R.CHR2, RK.ID RK_ID , RK.MAC RK_MAC, RK.PASSWORD RK_PASSWORD, RK.MANUFACTURER_ID RK_MANUFACTURER_ID, RK.RESOURCE_ID RK_RESOURCE_ID, RK.R_INT1 RK_R_INT1, RK.R_INT2 RK_R_INT2, RK.NUM1 RK_NUM1, RK.NUM2 RK_NUM2, RK.VC1 RK_VC1, RK.VC2 RK_VC2, RK.CHR1 RK_CHR1, RK.CHR2 RK_CHR2

R.ID, R.NAME, R.TYPE_ID, R.STATUS, R.CREATE_DATE, R.CREATE_USER, R.BUILDING_ID, R.FLOOR, R.SEQUENCE, R.SHARE_ENABLE, R.NODE_PATH, R.IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE, R.PERMISSION_ATTR_ID, R.DEVICE_TYPE, R.NODE_ID, R.R_INT1, R.R_INT2, R.NUM1, R.NUM2, R.VC1, R.VC2, R.CHR1, R.CHR2, G.ID G_ID, G.NAME G_NAME , G.STATUS G_STATUS , G.IS_PUBLIC G_IS_PUBLIC , G.CREATE_DATE G_CREATE_DATE , G.CREATE_USER G_CREATE_USER , G.NUM1 G_NUM1 , G.NUM2 G_NUM2 , G.VC1 G_VC1 , G.VC2 G_VC2 , G.CHR1 G_CHR1 , G.CHR2 G_CHR2

R.ID, R.NAME, R.TYPE_ID, R.STATUS, R.CREATE_DATE, R.CREATE_USER, R.BUILDING_ID, R.FLOOR, R.SEQUENCE, R.SHARE_ENABLE, R.R_INT1, R.R_INT2, R.NUM1, R.NUM2, R.VC1, R.VC2, R.CHR1, R.CHR2, R.NODE_PATH, R.IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE, R.PERMISSION_ATTR_ID, R.DEVICE_TYPE, R.NODE_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM RESOURCE R LEFT JOIN RESOURCE_GROUP_REL GR ON R.ID=GR.RESOURCE_ID LEFT JOIN RESOURCE_GROUP G ON G.ID=GR.RGROUP_ID , RESOURCE_KEY RK where R.ID=RK.RESOURCE_ID AND RK.MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into RESOURCE (ID, NAME, TYPE_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, BUILDING_ID, FLOOR, SEQUENCE, SHARE_ENABLE, NODE_PATH, IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE, PERMISSION_ATTR_ID, DEVICE_TYPE, NODE_ID R_INT1, R_INT2, NUM1, NUM2, VC1, VC2, CHR1, CHR2 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareEnable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nodePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVirtualResource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{permissionAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rInt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rInt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chr1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chr2,jdbcType=CHAR} )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

mapper.update:
update RESOURCE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHARE_ENABLE = #{shareEnable,jdbcType=CHAR},
NODE_PATH = #{nodePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE = #{isVirtualResource,jdbcType=CHAR},
PERMISSION_ATTR_ID = #{permissionAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
R_INT1 = #{rInt1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
R_INT2 = #{rInt2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM1 = #{num1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM2 = #{num2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VC1 = #{vc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VC2 = #{vc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHR1 = #{chr1,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHR2 = #{chr2,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update RESOURCE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_ENABLE = #{shareEnable,jdbcType=CHAR}, NODE_PATH = #{nodePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VIRTUAL_RESOURCE = #{isVirtualResource,jdbcType=CHAR}, PERMISSION_ATTR_ID = #{permissionAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_INT1 = #{rInt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_INT2 = #{rInt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM1 = #{num1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM2 = #{num2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VC1 = #{vc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VC2 = #{vc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHR1 = #{chr1,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHR2 = #{chr2,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
FROM RESOURCE R, CUSTOMER_RESOURCE_REL CR WHERE CR.RESOURCE_ID=R.ID AND R.SHARE_ENABLE='Y' AND (CR.START_DATE IS NULL OR CR.START_DATE < now()) AND (CR.END_DATE IS NULL OR CR.END_DATE > now()) AND CR.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
FROM RESOURCE R, CUSTOMER_RESOURCE_REL CR WHERE CR.RESOURCE_ID=R.ID AND R.STATUS='Y' AND (CR.START_DATE IS NULL OR CR.START_DATE < now()) AND (CR.END_DATE IS NULL OR CR.END_DATE > now()) AND CR.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND R.BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND PERMISSION_ATTR_ID != 1

select
FROM RESOURCE R LEFT JOIN RESOURCE_KEY RK ON R.ID=RK.RESOURCE_ID, CUSTOMER_RESOURCE_REL CR WHERE CR.RESOURCE_ID=R.ID AND R.STATUS='Y' AND CR.ENABLE='Y' AND (CR.START_DATE IS NULL OR CR.START_DATE < now()) AND (CR.END_DATE IS NULL OR CR.END_DATE > now()) AND CR.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND R.BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND PERMISSION_ATTR_ID != 1
select R.ID from RESOURCE R, RESOURCE_KEY RK where R.ID=RK.RESOURCE_ID AND RK.MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
